name: Robot Police - All Creeps in Jail!
name_original: Robot Police - All Creeps in Jail!
description:
“Amazing interface”
“Kids-friendly”
“Great audio-visual quality”
_________________________

Help the robot police with your gaming skills. The robot police officer wants to fly high in the sky so that he can keep an eye over the city. However, he needs your help. Tap the screen and start playing the game. As you tap, the robot police officer starts flying. Your job is to take him higher while saving him from the moving obstacles on both the sides. Obstacles can move from right to left and left to right only. For better control, you are provided with the motion sensing technology. Simply, tilt the screen left to take the police officer in the left direction and tilt right to take him in the right direction.

The game is full of exciting new levels. As you go to the higher levels, you enjoy more cool but challenging obstacles. Collect the maximum points you can to be the highest scorer.

+++Game Features+++
“Touch and Tap Game”
“Needs Precision and Focus”
“Motion Sensing”
